data.name: Caveman adventures in jungle for Run, chicken, run!
data.detailed_description:
Caveman adventures in jungle for Run, chicken, run! - this is an additional content, with the new design for the endless game for the whole family. If you are bored with the chicken run, you can run as a Wayne!

Just imagine, jungle was captured by the aliens and almost all prehistoric animals were caught and placed in small and uncomfortable cages. Dinosaurs, pterodactyls and other prehistoric animals are feeling lonely, scared and very sad. But a brave caveman named Wayne has decided to make everything possible to save his friends. He has never seen the forces which captured his friends before, but he is ready to fight with them.

Help Wayne in his quest to rescue all the animals in the jungle. Run away from the aliens as fast as you can, break the cages, free animals and collect stars. But you must be very careful, beware of stones and rockets, jump over the water, if you will fall in the water you will die. Yes, this is a jungle and there are a lot of different dangerous obstacles, but don't forget that Wayne is a caveman and jungle is his home.

Caveman adventures in jungle will not let you be bored. Wayne can run, accelerate and fly with parachute, if this is necessary, but he is just a man and sometimes he becomes tired. If Wayne will get tired he may ask his friends: bull and gorilla, to give him a ride. All animals in the prehistoric jungle love Wayne and are always ready to help. Run forward, collect stars and change them to another main heroes or to rockets, new rides on bull or gorilla, to the acceleration and many other cool features. You can dress your caveman to give him a special style. Download this DLC and find out what else it can offer you. I am sure you will not regret.

Features:
Nice colorful design
Funny personages and music
Easy control
Universal adventures for all ages

Caveman adventures in jungle is a fun adventure that the whole family will enjoy!

The content of this DLC will be available from the game main menu.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

package_groups.title: Buy Caveman adventures in jungle for Run, chicken, run!

subs.option_text: Caveman adventures in jungle for Run, chicken, run! - 1,99€
